itunes:title: nutrition 101: macros + micros // why nutrition matters + what it does for our health
title: nutrition 101: macros + micros // why nutrition matters + what it does for our health
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
if you have ever felt overwhelmed or lost when it comes to the science of nutrition, then this is the episode for you! britt is serving up some major brain gains, going in depth on macros, micros, vitamins & minerals— WHY nutrition matters, WHAT role nutrition plays in our health & HOW you can make educated strides with using food to fuel a healthy, happy life full of fun & gains.

8:22 MICROS: fruit’s & vegetables

17:27 potassium

18:00 YOU ARE NOT ALONE

18:15 britt’s tips

21:40 MACROS: protein, fat & carbs

22:00 CARBS

25:10 whole vs refined 

25:22 PROTEIN

27:50 sources 

28:50 FAT

29:20 sources

30:00 saturated vs unsaturated

30:30 omega 3’s

33:22 balance

34:20 get the most out of your workouts 

34:30 *disclaimer*
